insert into gui_area ( code, parent_code, name, short_name, longitude, latitude, level, ur_code, sort, status, create_time, update_time ) values
( #{record.code,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{record.parentCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.shortName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{record.longitude,jdbcType=REAL}, #{record.latitude,jdbcType=REAL}, #{record.level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.urCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{record.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
